showScoreExcerpt:
“I must confess that I had a wonderful time at the revival and left feeling rejuvenated, with its burlesque spirit serving as medicine...But more than that, given the state of the world today, with people still recovering from the effects of the pandemic and ever intensifying political tensions, we need the cathartic release of pure Broadway musical comedy...In short, we need ‘Spamalot’.”
